description.displayText:
Savannah took care of our toddler and infant so we could have a long overdue date night and we knew right from the moment she arrived that all would be well.  She asked all the right questions before we left and checked in while we were gone to let us know how things were going.  We came home to a tidy space and sleeping children.  

We look forward to working with Savannah again and recommend her highly.
